# This is the CMakeCache file.
# For build in directory: /home/bartoc/.worts/bld/OpenImageIO-1.7.16-1/build
# It was generated by CMake: /usr/bin/cmake
# You can edit this file to change values found and used by cmake.
# If you do not want to change any of the values, simply exit the editor.
# If you do want to change a value, simply edit, save, and exit the editor.
# The syntax for the file is as follows:
# KEY:TYPE=VALUE
# KEY is the name of a variable in the cache.
# TYPE is a hint to GUIs for the type of VALUE, DO NOT EDIT TYPE!.
# VALUE is the current value for the KEY.

########################
# EXTERNAL cache entries
########################

//Install location for binaries (relative to CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX
// or absolute)
BIN_INSTALL_DIR:STRING=bin

//Build static library instead of shared
BUILDSTATIC:BOOL=OFF

//If ON, will build *only* libOpenImageIO_Util
BUILD_OIIOUTIL_ONLY:BOOL=OFF

//Build the testing tree.
BUILD_TESTING:BOOL=OFF

//Build code coverage tests
CODECOV:BOOL=OFF

//Embed format plugins in libOpenImageIO
EMBEDPLUGINS:BOOL=ON

//Extra C++ command line definitions
EXTRA_CPP_ARGS:STRING=

//Extra command line definitions when building DSOs
EXTRA_DSO_LINK_ARGS:STRING=

//Build the unit tests
OIIO_BUILD_TESTS:BOOL=OFF

//Build the command-line tools
OIIO_BUILD_TOOLS:BOOL=OFF

//Specify the master OpenImageIO C++ namespace: Options include
// OpenImageIO OpenImageIO_<YOURFACILITY> etc.
OIIO_NAMESPACE:STRING=OpenImageIO

//OIIO threads may use DCLP for speed
OIIO_THREAD_ALLOW_DCLP:BOOL=ON

//Stop building if there are any compiler warnings
STOP_ON_WARNING:BOOL=OFF

//Use ccache if found
USE_CCACHE:BOOL=OFF

//Compile in C++11 mode
USE_CPP11:BOOL=ON

//Compile in C++14 mode
USE_CPP14:BOOL=ON

//Use an externally built shared library version of the pugixml
// library
USE_EXTERNAL_PUGIXML:BOOL=OFF

//Use FFmpeg if found
USE_FFMPEG:BOOL=OFF

//Use Field3D if found
USE_FIELD3D:BOOL=OFF

//Use Freetype if found
USE_FREETYPE:BOOL=OFF

//Use GIF if found
USE_GIF:BOOL=OFF

//Use JPEG-Turbo if found
USE_JPEGTURBO:BOOL=OFF

//Compile with clang libc++
USE_LIBCPLUSPLUS:BOOL=OFF

//Use LibRaw if found
USE_LIBRAW:BOOL=OFF

//Build Nuke plugins, if Nuke is found
USE_NUKE:BOOL=OFF

//Use OpenColorIO for color management if found
USE_OCIO:BOOL=OFF

//Use OpenCV if found
USE_OPENCV:BOOL=OFF

//Include OpenGL support
USE_OPENGL:BOOL=OFF

//Use OpenJpeg if found
USE_OPENJPEG:BOOL=OFF

//Use OpenSSL if found (for faster SHA-1)
USE_OPENSSL:BOOL=OFF

//Use PTex if found
USE_PTEX:BOOL=OFF

//Build the Python bindings
USE_PYTHON:BOOL=OFF

//Build the Python3 bindings
USE_PYTHON3:BOOL=OFF

//Include Qt support
USE_QT:BOOL=OFF

//Use SIMD directives (0, sse2, sse3, ssse3, sse4.1, sse4.2, avx,
// avx2, avx512f, f16c)
USE_SIMD:STRING=

//Build with -fPIC
USE_fPIC:BOOL=OFF

//Print lots of messages while compiling
VERBOSE:BOOL=OFF
